message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, based on my research and budget, I am only able to offer $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $13,500. I would like to propose $13,200 as my final offer.
